AuditCategory.name: Cable Management
AuditCategory.description: Set of audit rules related to cables

AuditRule.name: Cable is connected to only one network socket
AuditRule.description: Only one end of the cable is attached to a network socket
AuditRule.query: SELECT NetworkCable AS nc WHERE (nc.networksocket1_id != 0) AND (nc.networksocket2_id != 0)
